Test step:

2. Provide email: "user@example.com"
3. Provide password: "securepass123"
4. Submit registration
Expected Result (ER):
1. Status 201 Created
2. User account created
3. Token returned
4. UserProfile auto-created

Test step:
1. Send POST request to /api/register/
2. Provide phone_number: "+1234567890"
3. Provide password: "securepass123"
4. Submit registration
Expected Result (ER):
1. Status 201 Created
2. User account created
3. Token returned
4. UserProfile auto-created

Test step:

2. Provide email and password
3. Include preferences: [1, 2, 3]
4. Submit registration
Expected Result (ER):

2. User created with preferences
3. Preferences linked to user profile

Test step:

2. Provide email, password, first_name, last_name
3. Provide date_of_birth, gender, bio
4. Submit registration
Expected Result (ER):
1. Status 201 Created
2. All fields saved correctly
3. Complete profile returned

Test step:

2. Try to register again with same email
3. Submit registration
Expected Result (ER):

2. Error message about duplicate email
3. Registration rejected

Test step:
1. Create user with phone "+1234567890"
2. Try to register again with same phone
3. Submit registration
Expected Result (ER):
1. Status 400 Bad Request
2. Error message about duplicate phone
3. Registration rejected

Test step:

3. Provide email and password
4. Submit registration
Expected Result (ER):
1. Status 400 Bad Request
2. Age validation error message
3. Registration rejected

Test step:

3. Provide email and password
4. Submit registration
Expected Result (ER):

Test case name: Register with future date of birth
Test step:
1. Send POST request to /api/register/
2. Provide future date_of_birth
3. Provide email and password
4. Submit registration
Expected Result (ER):
1. Status 400 Bad Request
2. Date validation error
3. Registration rejected
Remark: Birth date cannot be in future

Test step:

2. Provide only password
3. No email or phone_number
4. Submit registration
Expected Result (ER):
1. Status 400 Bad Request
2. Error: At least email or phone required
3. Registration rejected

Test step:

4. Submit logout
Expected Result (ER):

2. Token revoked/deleted
3. Token no longer valid for future requests

Test step:

2. No Authorization header provided
3. Submit logout
Expected Result (ER):
1. Status 401 Unauthorized

3. Logout rejected

Test step:

2. All connected users receive message

Test step:

3. User B receives in real-time

2. No polling required
3. WebSocket push notification

Test step:

3. Include password
4. Submit login
Expected Result (ER):

2. SQL injection prevented
3. No data breach
Tested Date: Django ORM protects against SQL injection

Test step:

4. Retrieve message
Expected Result (ER):

2. Script tags escaped/sanitized
3. XSS prevented
